extracted_playbook.title: Document Device Configurations
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain updated documentation describing the current configuration details of all critical IT assets to facilitate effective vulnerability and response activities.

extracted_playbook.title: Patch Systems for Known Exploited Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Keep all software up to date and patch systems for known exploited vulnerabilities. Conduct investigation prior to patching in places with known exploited vulnerabilities on an endpoint device.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Routine Patching Cycle
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a routine patching cycle for all operating systems, applications, and software to mitigate potential exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Conduct Vulnerability Scans
extracted_playbook.description: Prioritize remediation of vulnerabilities on internet-facing systems by conducting continuous automated and/or routine vulnerability scans.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Security.txt Files
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all public-facing web domains have a security.txt file conforming to RFC 9116 recommendations.

extracted_playbook.title: Employ Proper Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network segmentation, such as a DMZ, to protect internal LAN from untrusted traffic and reduce threat actor lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Internet-Facing Port Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Limit exposed ports to only required IP addresses and avoid placing wildcards in destination port or host entries.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Unsecured Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure unsecured protocols like FTP and HTTP are limited in use and restricted to specific IP ranges.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Protocols for Data Flow
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure data flows from untrusted zone to trusted zone over secure protocols like HTTPS with mandatory multi-factor authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewall and Enable Logging
extracted_playbook.description: Use a firewall or web-application firewall (WAF) and enable logging to prevent/detect potential exploitation attempts.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Firewall Rules
extracted_playbook.description: Review ingress and egress firewall rules and block all unapproved protocols. Limit risky protocols through rules.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation by Role
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network segmentation to separate network segments based on role and functionality.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Phishing-Resistant Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Implement phishing-resistant MFA for remote access and access to sensitive data repositories, particularly for webmail and VPNs.

extracted_playbook.title: Employ Strong Password Management
extracted_playbook.description: Set a password policy to require complex passwords for all users and enforce this requirement as passwords expire.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Principle of Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Limit the ability of local administrator accounts to log in from a local interactive session and prevent access via RDP session.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Unnecessary Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Establish policy and procedure for the prompt removal of unnecessary accounts and groups, especially privileged accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Local Administrator Password Solution (LAPS)
extracted_playbook.description: Implement and enforce the use of LAPS to control and limit local administration.

extracted_playbook.title: Create Change Control Process for Privilege Escalations
extracted_playbook.description: Create a change control process for all privilege escalations and role changes on user accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Secure System Baseline Image
extracted_playbook.description: Create and deploy a secure system baseline image to all workstations.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Workstation-to-Workstation RDP Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Implement policies to block workstation-to-workstation RDP connections through a Group Policy Object on Windows.

extracted_playbook.title: Establish Software Behavior Baseline
extracted_playbook.description: Establish a software behavior baseline to detect anomalies in behavior.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Unauthorized Use of Remote Access Software
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor for unauthorized use of remote access software using endpoint detection tools.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Application Allowlists
extracted_playbook.description: Use application allowlists on domain controllers, administrative hosts, and other sensitive systems to prevent unauthorized software execution.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Scheduled Tasks
extracted_playbook.description: Audit scheduled tasks and validate all findings via a Group Policy Object or endpoint detection and response solution.
